#summary HOW TO change position and style?

= HOW TO change position and style? =

USE "template.css" in folder "css" of your current Joomla! template!!!

See this fragment of capthca plugin for details

for components

{{{
<div id='CaptchaForm'>
<fieldset>
<legend><?php JText::_( 'CAPTCHACODE_FORM_TITLE' ) ?></legend>

	<div id="captchaimage"><img src='<?php echo $url_image ?>' title='<?php echo JText::_( 'CAPTCHACODE_FORM_TEXT' ) ?>' alt='<?php echo JText::_( 'CAPTCHACODE_FORM_TEXT' ) ?>'></div>
<div id='captchacode_outer'><label for='captchacode'><?php echo JText::_( 'CAPTCHACODE_FORM_TEXT' ) ?></label>&nbsp;

</fieldset>
</div>
	<div id="captchahelplink" style="font-size: xx-small"><?php echo JText::_( 'CAPTCHACODE_HELP' ) ?>
